summary: Apollo 13 was a NASA mission to the Moon in 1970. An explosion in the spacecraft's oxygen tank caused a dangerous situation. The crew had to abandon their lunar landing plan and use the lunar module as a "lifeboat." They faced challenges like cold, wet conditions and low power. Mission control helped them return safely to Earth. The mission showed the power of quick thinking and teamwork. It captured the world's attention and inspired a movie and book.
title: Apollo 13
